data.name: St. Louis Group
data.description:
St. Louis Group (SLG) and Zeller Polymer Solutions, an affiliate of St. Louis Group, have the same overarching commitment to excellence and innovation while bringing a wealth of expertise to the chemical additives industry.

Founded in 2010, St. Louis Group has since grown into a leading supplier of Flame Retardants (FRs) and Smoke Suppressants with a diverse portfolio. SLG’s alliances with a global network of suppliers, in combination with our domestic manufacturing operations, allow us to offer halogenated and non-halogenated solutions to our customers. Due to our broad product lines and knowledge of additive, reactive, intumescent, and low smoke mechanisms, SLG is able to also provide tailor made low viscosity solutions to meet the most stringent flammability and smoke requirements. Our industry experience, reliable supply channels, cutting-edge technologies, custom offerings, and unsurpassed commitment to customer service make SLG your preferred choice in the industry.

Zeller Polymer Solutions specializes in Antioxidant and UV Light Stabilizer solutions. Our team of experts are equipped with decades of experience in the chemical additives industry with the primary goal to exceed the expectations of our customers, both present and future. At Zeller, we understand the importance of efficient logistics and prompt delivery. With our robust global logistics capabilities and our strategically located warehouses, we ensure that our products reach customers around the world in a timely manner. We pride ourselves on delivering products of the utmost quality while still constantly driving innovation to provide you with the latest solutions and technologies. Zeller’s unwavering commitment to unparalleled customer service ensures that your needs are always our top priority. With our extensive global capabilities, we not only guarantee high-quality products but also strive to offer them at competitive prices, resulting in cost savings for our customer.

Together, St. Louis Group and Zeller Polymer Solutions are at the forefront of the chemical additives industry, delivering excellence, innovation, and customer-focused solutions on a global scale.

data.name: BroShield
data.description: St. Louis Group is an established & viable supplier of brominated flame retardants. We are a domestic manufacturer of brominated polyols and blends. We also have contract manufacturing operations in China. Specialty dispersions and masterbatches are available upon request.

data.name: FireGard
data.description: St. Louis Group is one of the largest volume suppliers of antimony trioxide (ATO) in the US market. We are vertically integrated with mining and production operations in Bolivia and have contract manufacturing operations in China. Specialty dispersions and masterbatches are available upon request.

data.name: FireBlend
data.description: Our FireBlend® line offers alternatives to antimony trioxide. We produce these proprietary products domestically and tailor them to flame retardant requirements.

data.name: PhosGard
data.description: St. Louis Group offers a wide range of highly effective liquid & powder phosphorus based flame retardants. Specialty dispersions, blends, and masterbatches are available upon request.

data.name: SmokeShield
data.description: St. Louis Group manufactures and distributes a comprehensive line of smoke suppressants that include traditional smoke suppressants, as well as low cost AOM alternatives and high-performance proprietary blends.

data.name: CharFlam
data.description: CharFlam brand offers non-halogenated products that promote char formation in intumescent flame retardant applications & engineering resins.

data.name: MagFlam
data.description: St. Louis Group offers a variety of magnesium hydroxide halogen free flame retardants.

data.name: St. Louis Group Antimony Metal
data.description: St. Louis Group Antimony Metal is a versatile ingot form of antimony, serving a range of vital roles. This metal finds its significance in applications such as batteries manufacturing and soldering flux, contributing to the creation of cables and supporting electrical and electronics markets. As an essential component in technical salts and inorganics, it embodies the prowess of antimony compounds. Antimony Metal is available in 4 grades: G1,G2,G3,G4.

data.name: PhosGard® MPP-Poly
data.description: PhosGard® MPP-Poly takes the form of a high-purity melamine polyphosphate with excellent thermal stability, showcased by its fine white powder appearance. This product proves to be an effective non-halogenated flame retardant, finding utility in water-based coatings, polyurethanes, thermosets, and polyolefins.

data.name: FireGard® Wetted ATO
data.description: FireGard® Wetted ATO is a powerful flame retardant additive that combines Antimony Trioxide with 2% DIDP. This liquid-form industrial additive, designed to enhance fire resistance, serves as an effective flame retardant. Its applications include chemicals production, making it an essential choice for fire safety enhancement. FireGard® Wetted ATO is part of the industrial additives category and is available in convenient drum packaging. It is particularly suitable for various processes within chemicals production, offering advanced fire protection.

data.name: FireBlend® 11
data.description: FireBlend® 11 is a highly effective additive designed to enhance fire safety in plastics and elastomers. It functions as both a flame retardant and a smoke suppressant, making it an ideal choice for various applications. This additive is compatible with polymers like polyesters, polyolefins, and PVC. Its white powder form makes it easy to incorporate into different materials.

data.name: Z-NOX® B900
data.description: Z-NOX® B900 represents an antioxidant blend composed of Z-NOX® 168 and Z-NOX® 1076, specifically developed for PE and PP films. With a white powder appearance, this blend is proficient in stabilizing heat degradation and oxidative degradation during processing and end applications. It can be used in conjunction with light stabilizers like Z-LITE® 22 or Z-LITE® 29.

data.name: PhosGard® APP-MC
data.description: PhosGard® APP-MC emerges as a melamine-coated, fine particle crystal phase II modified Ammonium Polyphosphate, seen in its fine white powder form. Its role aligns with that of an effective non-halogenated flame retardant suitable for water-based coatings, polyurethanes, thermosets, and polyolefins.

data.name: Z-NOX® 20

data.description: Z-NOX® 20 functions as a hindered phenolic antioxidant for thermoplastic polymer processing. Its appearance ranges from white to grainy powder. Its role involves countering polymer degradation during long-term aging and preventing discoloration at high temperatures. The product's compatibility spans a wide range of polymers and is accompanied by low volatility.

data.name: Z-NOX® 3114

summary.name: Synonyms
items: 1,3,5-Tri(3,5-di-tert-butyl-4-hydroxybenzyl) isocyanurate, 1,3,5-Tris(3,5-di-tert-butyl-4-hydroxybenzyl) isocyanurate, 1,3,5-Tris(3,5-di-tert-butyl-4-hydroxybenzyl)-1,3,5-triazinane-2,4,6-trione, 1,3,5-Tris(3,5-di-tert-butyl-4-hydroxybenzyl)-1,3,5-triazine-2,4,6(1H,3H,5H)-trione, 1,3,5-Tris(3,5-di-tert-butyl-4-hydroxybenzyl)-s-triazin-2,4,6(1H,3H,5H)-trione, 1,3,5-Tris(3,5-di-tert-butyl-4-hydroxybenzyl)-s-triazine-2,4,6(1H,3H,5H)-trione, 1,3,5-Tris(3,5-di-tert-butyl-4-hydroxybenzyl)-s-triazinetrione, 1,3,5-tris(3,5-di-tert-butyl-4-hydroxybenzyl)[1,3,5]triazin-2,4,6-trione, 1,3,5-Tris(3,5-di-tert-butyl-4-hydroxybenzyl)isocyanuric acid), 1,3,5-Tris(3′,5′-di-tert-butyl-4′-hydroxybenzyl)-5-triazine-2,4,6(1H,3H,5H)-trione, 1,3,5-Tris(4-hydroxy-3,5-di-tert-butylbenzyl)cyanuric acid, 1,3,5-Tris[(3,5-ditert-butyl-4-hydroxyphenyl)methyl]-1,3,5-triazinane-2,4,6-trione, 1,3,5-Tris[[3,5-bis(1,1-dimethylethyl)-4-hydroxyphenyl]methyl]-1,3,5-triazine-2,4,6(1H,3H,5H)-trione, Tris(3,5-di-tert-butyl-4-hydroxybenzyl) isocyanurate

data.description: Z-NOX® 3114 is an antioxidant formulated for plastics & elastomers applications. Belonging to the chemical family of phenols, this product serves as a protective agent against oxidation processes. Compatible with polymers and resins such as acrylonitrile butadiene styrene (ABS), polycarbonates (PC), polyethylenes (PE), and polypropylenes (PP), Z-NOX® 3114 offers the benefit of low color formation and low gas fade. This essential additive enhances material quality by preventing degradation and maintaining the appearance and properties of plastics and elastomers in various technological uses.

data.name: BroShield® 8408
data.description: BroShield® 8408 is a flame retardant and plasticizer for plastics and elastomers, particularly PVC. This halogenated product offers good thermal stability and cost-effective performance. Its clear liquid form makes it easy to work with, especially in film applications. Certified under CERCLA, SARA 313, Clean Water Act (CWA), and California Proposition 65.

data.seo_description: St. Louis Group (SLG) and Zeller Polymer Solutions, an affiliate of St. Louis Group, have the same overarching commitment to excellence and innovation while bringing a wealth of expertise to the chemi

featured_products.name: BroShield® 21-B
featured_products.description: BroShield® 21-B is a high purity, non-diphenyl oxide, brominated flame retardant with excellent thermal stability.

featured_products.name: BroShield® RB-11
featured_products.description: BroShield® RB-11 is an efficient flame retardant for achieving the ASTM E-84 flammability test. The high halogen content & low viscosity make it a suitable choice over diols.

featured_products.name: PhosGard® 140
featured_products.description: PhosGard® 140 is a low viscosity tris (2-butoxyethyl) phosphate that acts as an effective leveling agent and defoamer.

featured_products.name: PhosGard® NH4
featured_products.description: PhosGard® NH4 is a halogen free phosphate flame retardant/plasticizer that demonstrates very low scorch & volatility.

featured_products.name: SmokeShield® ZB4
featured_products.description: SmokeShield® ZB4 is a fine particle sized zinc borate smoke suppressant. It also acts as a flame retardant synergist and a partial replacement of antimony oxide.

featured_products.name: SmokeShield® ZM-2
featured_products.description: SmokeShield® ZM-2 is a high performance, non-molybdenum, low cost AOM replacement smoke suppressant with excellent thermal stability.

featured_products.name: Z-LITE® 94
featured_products.description: Z-LITE® 94 is an effective hindered amine light stabilizer used in polyolefin and other polymers.

featured_products.name: Z-NOX® 1076
featured_products.description: Z-NOX® 1076 is a hindered phenolic antioxidant that is suitable for thermoplastics and synthetic fibers.

data.name: SmokeShield
data.html_description: St. Louis Group manufactures and distributes a comprehensive line of smoke suppressants that include traditional smoke suppressants, as well as low cost AOM alternatives and high-performance proprietary blends.
data.text_description: St. Louis Group manufactures and distributes a comprehensive line of smoke suppressants that include traditional smoke suppressants, as well as low cost AOM alternatives and high-performance proprietary blends.
data.seo_description: St. Louis Group manufactures and distributes a comprehensive line of smoke suppressants that include traditional smoke suppressants, as well as low cost AOM alternatives and high-performance proprieta

data.name: SmokeShield® AOM
data.description: SmokeShield® AOM stands as a high-performance smoke suppressant containing Molybdenum, actively suppressing smoke in halogenated polymers, particularly PVC. Its role involves acting as a char former in the condensed phase. Its applications span jacketing and insulation for plenum and riser cables, plastisols, calendered sheets, belting, carpet tiles, and extruded sheets for subway and aircraft interiors.

data.name: SmokeShield® AOM-XF
data.description: SmokeShield® AOM-XF is a smoke suppressant for plastics and elastomers, categorized under performance additives. It is used in applications such as plenum cable insulation, plenum cable jacketing, riser cables, HVAC insulation, belts/belt repair, sheets, carpet tiles, and aircraft interiors. SmokeShield® AOM-XF offers excellent performance and is known as a charformer.

data.name: SmokeShield® ZB2
data.description: SmokeShield® ZB2 stands as a flame retardant and smoke suppressant tailored for PVC-based applications. It demonstrates efficacy in halogenated polymers, functioning in the condensed phase to create char. This versatile product serves as a flame-retardant synergist and a partial replacement for antimony oxide in numerous PVC applications. Its diverse applications range from plenum and riser cable jacketing to HVAC insulation, plastisols, calendered sheets, belting, and carpet tiles.

data.name: SmokeShield® ZB4
data.description: SmokeShield® ZB4 is a versatile flame retardant additive designed for both plastics and elastomers. As a white powder containing zinc borate, this product functions as a synergist and charformer, enhancing flame retardancy while effectively reducing smoke emission. It is compatible with polymers like PVC, polyesters, PE, and PP. With its low smoke emission feature and charforming capabilities, SmokeShield® ZB4 is a reliable choice for achieving improved fire safety in various applications.

data.name: SmokeShield® ZB4-XFA
data.description: SmokeShield® ZB4-XFA is a multifunctional additive designed to enhance the fire retardant properties of both plastics and elastomers. This product acts as a flame retardant, a smoke suppressant, and a synergist. Its compatibility with PVC makes it suitable for various applications. The white powder form ensures easy incorporation, and it functions as a char former, contributing to fire safety.

data.name: SmokeShield® ZB5
data.description: SmokeShield® ZB5 proves its worth as an effective flame retardant synergist and char former. In engineering plastics, it acts as both a flame retardant and a smoke suppressant. Notably, it maintains high thermal stability, rendering it suitable for systems processed at elevated temperatures. Its appearance takes the form of a fine white powder.

data.name: SmokeShield® ZB8
data.description: SmokeShield® ZB8 is a versatile additive catering to the flame retardant needs of plastics and elastomers. With its dual functionality as both a flame retardant and a smoke suppressant, this product is especially suitable for applications like cables and wires made of polyvinyl chloride (PVC). Notably, SmokeShield® ZB8 also serves as a char forming agent, adding an additional layer of fire protection.

data.name: SmokeShield® ZHS
data.description: SmokeShield® ZHS is a fine particle size zinc hydroxystannate flame retardant and smoke suppressant. This fine white to off-white powder effectively suppresses smoke in halogenated polymers, notably PVC, functioning as a charformer in the condensed phase. It serves as a potent flame retardant synergist and a replacement for antimony oxide in flexible PVC and halogenated polyesters.

data.name: SmokeShield® ZM-11
data.description: SmokeShield® ZM-11 is a fine white powder, featuring an effective mixed metal smoke suppressant with a remarkable balance of flame retardancy, smoke suppression, and heat stability. This versatile complex also exhibits excellent wet electrical properties, making it a valuable choice for various applications.

data.name: SmokeShield® ZM-2
data.description: SmokeShield® ZM-2 is a fine white powder that serves as a high-performance flame retardant and smoke suppressant for polyvinyl chloride (PVC) applications. With its good thermal stability and odorless nature, it offers enhanced fire safety and reduced smoke emission. This molybdenum-free additive also boasts good electrical properties, making it an ideal choice for PVC formulations.

data.name: SmokeShield® ZM-20
data.description: SmokeShield® ZM-20 is a cost-effective and high-performance smoke suppressant designed for polyvinyl chloride (PVC) applications. This fine powder additive, featuring zinc and molybdenum compounds, offers excellent fire safety with low smoke emission, making it an ideal choice for cables, wires, and plenum cable jacketing.

data.name: SmokeShield® ZM-4
data.description: SmokeShield® ZM-4 is a reliable smoke suppressant additive tailored for enhancing the fire safety of polyvinyl chloride (PVC) applications. This fine powder, comprising zinc and molybdenum compounds, offers a cost-effective solution with low smoke emission characteristics. Ideal for cables, wires, and plenum cable jacketing, SmokeShield® ZM-4 serves as an alternative solution.

data.name: SmokeShield® ZM-7
data.description: SmokeShield® ZM-7 is an exceptional smoke suppressant complex, combining zinc and molybdenum compounds in the form of a white to off-white powder. Engineered as a versatile solution, SmokeShield® ZM-7 offers a budget-friendly substitute for ammonium octamolybdate (AOM). Its effectiveness in curtailing smoke emissions makes it a preferred choice for both flexible and rigid PVC applications, particularly in PVC-based wire and cable, sheet and film, as well as coatings.

data.name: SmokeShield® ZM-8
data.description: SmokeShield® ZM-8 is a potent zinc/molybdate complex that stands as an effective alternative to ammonium octamolybdate (AOM) smoke suppressants. This AOM-alternative is presented in the form of a white powder, meticulously designed to diminish smoke generation across halogenated and various polymers. SmokeShield® ZM-8 doesn't just enhance fire safety; it also streamlines costs.

data.name: SmokeShield® ZS
data.description: SmokeShield® ZS is a finely engineered zinc stannate flame retardant and smoke suppressant designed to elevate fire safety across a diverse range of polymer systems. Presented as a fine white to off-white powder, SmokeShield® ZS acts as a robust smoke suppressant, particularly effective in halogenated polymers like PVC, where it operates as a condensed phase charformer.

products.seo_description: St. Louis Group (SLG) and Zeller Polymer Solutions, an affiliate of St. Louis Group, have the same overarching commitment to excellence and innovation while bringing a wealth of expertise to the chemi

featured_products.name: SmokeShield® ZB4
featured_products.description: SmokeShield® ZB4 is a fine particle sized zinc borate smoke suppressant. It also acts as a flame retardant synergist and a partial replacement of antimony oxide.

featured_products.name: SmokeShield® ZM-2
featured_products.description: SmokeShield® ZM-2 is a high performance, non-molybdenum, low cost AOM replacement smoke suppressant with excellent thermal stability.

data.name: St. Louis Group
data.description:
St. Louis Group (SLG) and Zeller Polymer Solutions, an affiliate of St. Louis Group, have the same overarching commitment to excellence and innovation while bringing a wealth of expertise to the chemical additives industry.

Founded in 2010, St. Louis Group has since grown into a leading supplier of Flame Retardants (FRs) and Smoke Suppressants with a diverse portfolio. SLG’s alliances with a global network of suppliers, in combination with our domestic manufacturing operations, allow us to offer halogenated and non-halogenated solutions to our customers. Due to our broad product lines and knowledge of additive, reactive, intumescent, and low smoke mechanisms, SLG is able to also provide tailor made low viscosity solutions to meet the most stringent flammability and smoke requirements. Our industry experience, reliable supply channels, cutting-edge technologies, custom offerings, and unsurpassed commitment to customer service make SLG your preferred choice in the industry.

Zeller Polymer Solutions specializes in Antioxidant and UV Light Stabilizer solutions. Our team of experts are equipped with decades of experience in the chemical additives industry with the primary goal to exceed the expectations of our customers, both present and future. At Zeller, we understand the importance of efficient logistics and prompt delivery. With our robust global logistics capabilities and our strategically located warehouses, we ensure that our products reach customers around the world in a timely manner. We pride ourselves on delivering products of the utmost quality while still constantly driving innovation to provide you with the latest solutions and technologies. Zeller’s unwavering commitment to unparalleled customer service ensures that your needs are always our top priority. With our extensive global capabilities, we not only guarantee high-quality products but also strive to offer them at competitive prices, resulting in cost savings for our customer.

Together, St. Louis Group and Zeller Polymer Solutions are at the forefront of the chemical additives industry, delivering excellence, innovation, and customer-focused solutions on a global scale.

ROW.TITLE: Knowde Software

0.TITLE: Knowde for Suppliers
0.DESCRIPTION: Transform how customers discover, engage and transact with you online with turnkey solutions for ingredient, polymer and chemical suppliers.

1.TITLE: Knowde for Distributors
1.DESCRIPTION: Delight both your principals and your customers with a modern online experience that differentiates your brand and accelerates business growth.

0.TITLE: Master Data Management Platform
0.DESCRIPTION: Digital transformation begins with clean data. Knowde organizes your structured product data in a matter of weeks.

1.TITLE: Customer Experience Application
1.DESCRIPTION: Knowde's turnkey application enables you to deliver an incredible customer experience on your website and turns it into a growth tool for your sales team.

2.TITLE: Knowde Marketplace
2.DESCRIPTION: Join the fastest growing marketplace for ingredients, polymers and chemicals. Get started for free!

TOOLTIP.TITLE: Why is this important?
TOOLTIP.PARAGRAPH_I: Knowde is a B2B platform where customers and suppliers conduct business online. Using a business email address demonstrates the legitimacy of your company and commercial intent, and you are much more likely to receive responses to your requests.
TOOLTIP.PARAGRAPH_II: You can still use a personal email but you may have additional company verification steps before getting access to all of {companyName}'s features.

PAYWALL.TITLE_1: Get new products to market faster with a free Knowde Marketplace account
PAYWALL.DESCRIPTION_1: Gain instant access to our marketplace of over 250,000 chemicals, ingredients and polymers from 8,000 suppliers. Browse, search, and filter to quickly compare products, find information, request documents, order samples, and get quotes directly from suppliers.
PAYWALL.TITLE_2: The fastest way to find the right raw materials for your products
PAYWALL.DESCRIPTION_2: Search and filter over 250,000 chemicals, ingredients and polymers, access documents and download starter formulations. Interact with over 8,000 suppliers whose representatives are ready to help. Sign up for a free Knowde Marketplace account today.
PAYWALL.DESCRIPTION_3: Create a free account to gain instant access to our marketplace of over 250,000 products and their documents.
